Paper.Title: Compiling HPSG type constraints into definite clause programs

Section.Paragraph: We present a new approach to HPSG processing: compiling HPSG grammars expressed as type constraints into definite clause programs. This provides a clear and computationally useful correspondence between linguistic theories and their implementation. The compiler performs off-line constraint inheritance and code optimization. As a result, we are able to efficiently process with HPSG grammars without haviog to hand-translate them into definite clause or phrase structure based systems. null
